section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/Required_placement_indicator
section.para: Required: The object that will indicate to the player where to place this item. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/Required_this_item
section.para: Required: Fill this property with the Misc Item this script is attached to. (Can't be "learned" by the script at runtime.) }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/z_position_offset
section.para: Adjust far up or down from the indicated position to place this item. Use if placed item is always above or below placement indicator position. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/z_angle_offset
section.para: Adjust Z angle (compass rotation) of placed item. Use if placed item is at a different angle than the placement indicator. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/consumable_ingredient
section.para: Optional: An ingredient that is needed and consumed when using / placing this item. Fill only the ingredient or the misc item property. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/consumable_misc_item
section.para: Optional: A misc item that is needed and consumed when using / placing this item. Fill only the ingredient or the misc item property. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/consumable_cost
section.para: Optional: How many of the ingredients or misc items that will be consumed when this item is used / placed. }

section.title: CampPlaceableMiscItem/necessary_perk
section.para: Optional: A perk required to use / place this item. }
